    • Method Detail

      • cellsNeededToRotate

        public java.util.Iterator<Cell> cellsNeededToRotate()
        Description copied from class: BasicBlock
        Function that returns the cells that are need to be free so that the block can rotate. These points are relative to the pivot cell of the block, which is always P (1,1) in the block model. The points are calculated based on the actual rotation of the block.
        Specified by:
        cellsNeededToRotate in class BasicBlock
        Returns:
        an iterator of Point
